malta is a noun meaning the metal "gold": Image:Malta.gifMalta is also the name in Quenya of the eighteenth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  It is the second letter of the fifth grade or Tyellë
Note: which contains "nasal" consonants and it is the fifth letter in the labial or p-series of consonants
The names of the letters: the Parmatéma.  In most modes this letter represents M.  However
column7: footnote 2 The Westron name for this letter is Mí.See Westron Tengwar

malta is a noun meaning the metal "gold": The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme SMAL.
